==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yunyun:''' Moo!
:{{DIcon}} Rub-rubs!
::'''Yunyun:''' (Yunyun sticks out its tongue without comprehension, but lets you rub its cheek anyway.)
:{{DIcon}} Pinches!
::'''Yunyun:''' (Yunyun tilts its head doubtfully, but goes along with you anyway...)
:{{DIcon}} See you later, Yunyun!
::'''Yunyun:''' (Yunyun lazily swings and stomps its feet. You suppose this can be considered a farewell.)
{{Dialogue End}}
